Package ohos.data.distributed.file

Class DistFiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.data.distributed.file.DistFiles
  • Deprecated. 
    This class conflicts with the sandbox design. Therefore, this class and the methods in it are deprecated. You are discouraged from using them. Currently, no third-party applications are using this class, so its deprecation brings no adverse impact. This class will be deleted in a future release as long as no new issue emerges.

    @Deprecated
public class DistFiles
extends Object
    Provides methods for the file manager to perform operations on distributed files or directories.
    Since:
    3

        @Deprecated
public static boolean isSupported​()
        Deprecated. 
        Checks whether DistFiles is supported on current device.
        Returns:
        Returns true if DistFiles is supported on current device; returns false otherwise.
        Since:

      • createFile

        @Deprecated
public static DistFile createFile​(String path)
                           throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Creates an empty distributed file denoted by the specified abstract pathname.

        This method first checks whether the distributed file denoted by the specified abstract pathname already exists.

        Parameters:
        path - Indicates the pathname of the distributed file to create.
        Returns:
        Returns the distributed file if it does not exist and is created successfully; returns null otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs.
        Since:
        3

      • createLinkFile

        @Deprecated
public static DistLinkFile createLinkFile​(String path,
                                          String target)
                                   throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Creates an empty link file denoted by the specified abstract pathname for a distributed file.

        This method first checks whether the link file denoted by the specified abstract pathname already exists.

        Parameters:
        path - Indicates the pathname of the source distributed file.
        target - Indicates the pathname of the link file to create.
        Returns:
        Returns the link file if it does not exist and is created successfully; returns null otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs.
        Since:
        3

      • createAgentFile

        @Deprecated
public static DistAgentFile createAgentFile​(String path,
                                            String target,
                                            String targetDevice)
                                     throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Creates an empty agent file denoted by the specified abstract pathname for a distributed file on the specified remote device.

        This method first checks whether the agent file denoted by the specified abstract pathname already exists on the specified remote device.

        Parameters:
        path - Indicates the pathname of the source distributed file.
        target - Indicates the pathname of the agent file to create.
        targetDevice - Indicates the remote device on which the agent file is to be created.
        Returns:
        Returns the agent file if it does not exist and is created successfully; returns null otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs.
        Since:
        3

      • delete

        @Deprecated
public static boolean delete​(String path)
        Deprecated. 
        Deletes the link file, agent file, or empty directory denoted by the specified abstract pathname.

        The source distributed file of an agent file will also be deleted, while that of a link file will not.

        Parameters:
        path - Indicates the pathname of the file or directory to delete.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the file or directory is deleted; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • delete

        @Deprecated
public static boolean delete​(DistFile file)
        Deprecated. 
        Deletes the distributed file or empty directory denoted by the specified abstract pathname.
        Parameters:
        file - Indicates the distributed file or empty directory to delete.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the file or directory is deleted; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • copy

        @Deprecated
public static boolean copy​(DistFile src,
                           DistFile dst)
                    throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Copies the content of a distributed file to another.

        This method supports cross-device copying.

        Parameters:
        src - Indicates the source distributed file.
        dst - Indicates the target distributed file.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the content is successfully copied to the target file; returns false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs.
        Since:
        3

      • move

        @Deprecated
public static boolean move​(DistFile src,
                           DistFile dst)
                    throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Moves a distributed file from a path to another.
        Parameters:
        src - Indicates the source path.
        dst - Indicates the target path.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the distributed file is successfully moved to the target path; returns false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs.
        Since:
        3
